content: कंचुकिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Furnished with armour or mail. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An attendant on the women's apartments, a chamberlain; (an important character in dramas); अंतःपुरचरो वृद्धो विप्रो गुणगणान्वितः . सर्वकार्यार्थकुशलः कंचकीत्यभिधीयते .. (he must be a Brāhmaṇa, very old, &c.; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>V. 3. 1</ls> and <ls>Ś. 5. 3</ls>). {@--2@} A libidinous man, debauchee. {@--3@} A serpent. {@--4@} A door keeper. {@--5@} Barley.
